title: Lesson 10 - Add routes to the application
contents:
mode_edit

第 10 课 - 向应用程序添加路由link

Lesson 10 - Add routes to the applicationlink

本课程示范了如何将路由添加到应用程序。

This tutorial lesson demonstrates how to add routes to your app.

所需时间： 完成这节课预计需要 25 分钟左右。

Time required: expect to spend about 25 minutes to complete this lesson.

开始之前link

Before you startlink

这节课以上一课的代码为起点，你可以：

This lesson starts with the code from the previous lesson, so you can:

  • 在集成开发环境（IDE）中使用你在第 9 课中创建的代码。

    Use the code that you created in Lesson 9 in your integrated development environment (IDE).

  • 从上一课的代码示例开始。选择，以便

    Start with the code example from the previous lesson. Choose the from Lesson 9 where you can:

    • 使用 StackBlitz 中的在线例子，其中 StackBlitz 的界面就是你的 IDE。

      Use the live example in StackBlitz, where the StackBlitz interface is your IDE.

    • 使用下载示例并在你的 IDE 中打开它。

      Use the download example and open it in your IDE.

如果你还没看过简介，请访问 Angular 教程简介以确保你已具备完成这节课所需的一切知识。

If you haven't reviewed the introduction, visit the Introduction to Angular tutorial to make sure you have everything you need to complete this lesson.

如果你在这节课中遇到任何问题，可以查看这节课的完整代码，参见。

If you have any trouble during this lesson, you can review the completed code for this lesson, in the for this lesson.

完成之后link

After you finishlink

在这节课结束时，应用程序将支持路由。

At the end of this lesson your application will have support for routing.

路由的概念性预览link

Conceptual preview of routinglink

本教程会介绍 Angular 中的路由。路由是从应用程序中的一个组件导航到另一个组件的能力。在单页应用程序（SPA）中，只有部分页面会更新以表示用户请求的视图。

This tutorial introduces routing in Angular. Routing is the ability to navigate from one component in the application to another. In single page applications (SPA), only parts of the page is updated to represent the requested view for the user.

Angular 路由器（Router）使用户能够声明路由并指定在应用程序请求该路由时应在屏幕上显示哪个组件。

The Angular Router enables users to declare routes and specify which component should be displayed on the screen if that route is requested by the application.

在这节课中，你将在应用程序中启用路由以导航到详情页。

In this lesson, you will enable routing in your application to navigate to the details page.

课程步骤link

Lesson stepslink

在 IDE 中对应用程序代码执行下列步骤。

Perform these steps on the app code in your IDE.

第 1 步 - 创建默认详情组件link

Step 1 - Create a default details componentlink

  1. 从终端输入以下命令以创建 DetailsComponent：

    From the terminal, enter the following command to create the DetailsComponent:

    ng generate component details --standalone --inline-template --skip-tests

    该组件将展现详情页面，该页面提供有关给定房屋位置的更多信息。

    This component will represent the details page that provides more information on a given housing location.

第 2 步 - 向应用程序添加路由link

Step 2 - Add routing to the applicationlink

  1. 在 src/app 目录中，创建一个名为 routes.ts 的文件。该文件是我们将在应用程序中定义路由的地方。

    In the src/app directory, create a file called routes.ts. This file is where we will define the routes in the application.

  2. 在 main.ts 中，进行以下更新以在应用程序中启用路由：

    In main.ts, make the following updates to enable routing in the application:

    1. 导入路由文件和 provideRouter 函数：

      Import the routes file and the provideRouter function:

      import { provideRouter } from '@angular/router'; import routeConfig from './app/routes';

    2. 更新对 bootstrapApplication 的调用以包含路由配置：

      Update the call to bootstrapApplication to include the routing configuration:

      bootstrapApplication(AppComponent, { providers: [ provideProtractorTestingSupport(), provideRouter(routeConfig) ] } ).catch(err => console.error(err));

  3. 在 src/app/app.component.ts 中，更新组件以使用路由：

    In src/app/app.component.ts, update the component to use routing:

    1. 为 RoutingModule 添加文件级导入：

      Add a file level import for RoutingModule:

      import { RouterModule } from '@angular/router';

    2. 将 RouterModule 添加到 @Component 元数据的 imports 中

      Add RouterModule to the @Component metadata imports

      imports: [ HomeComponent, RouterModule, ],

    3. 在 template 属性中，将 <app-home></app-home> 标记替换为 <router-outlet> 指令并添加返回主页的链接。你的代码应与此代码匹配：

      In the template property, replace the <app-home></app-home> tag with the <router-outlet> directive and add a link back to the home page. Your code should match this code:

      template: ` <main> <a [routerLink]="['/']"> <header class="brand-name"> <img class="brand-logo" src="/assets/logo.svg" alt="logo" aria-hidden="true"> </header> </a> <section class="content"> <router-outlet></router-outlet> </section> </main> `,

第 3 步 - 将路由添加到新组件link

Step 3 - Add route to new componentlink

在上一步中，你删除了模板中对 <app-home> 组件的引用。在此步骤中，你将向该组件添加一条新路由。

In the previous step you removed the reference to the <app-home> component in the template. In this step, you will add a new route to that component.

  1. 在 routes.ts 中，执行以下更新以创建路由。

    In routes.ts, perform the following updates to create a route.

    1. 为你将在路由定义中使用的 HomeComponent 、 DetailsComponent 和 Routes 类型添加文件级导入。

      Add a file level imports for the HomeComponent, DetailsComponent and the Routes type that you'll use in the route definitions.

      import { Routes } from '@angular/router'; import { HomeComponent } from './home/home.component'; import { DetailsComponent } from './details/details.component';

    2. 定义一个名为 routeConfig 的变量，类型为 Routes 并为应用程序定义两个路由：

      Define a variable called routeConfig of type Routes and define two routes for the app:

      const routeConfig: Routes = [ { path: '', component: HomeComponent, title: 'Home page' }, { path: 'details/:id', component: DetailsComponent, title: 'Home details' } ]; export default routeConfig;

      routeConfig 数组中的条目表示应用程序中的路由。只要 url 与 '' 匹配，第一个条目就会导航到 HomeComponent。第二个条目使用了一些特殊的格式，将在以后的课程中重新讨论。

      The entries in the routeConfig array represent the routes in the application. The first entry navigates to the HomeComponent whenever the url matches ''. The second entry uses some special formatting that will be revisited in a future lesson.

  2. 保存所有更改并确认应用程序正在浏览器中运行。该应用程序应该仍旧显示着房屋位置列表。

    Save all changes and confirm that the application works in the browser. The application should still display the list of housing locations.

课程回顾link

Lesson reviewlink

在这节课中，你在应用程序中启用了路由并定义了新路由。现在应用程序可以支持视图之间的导航。在下一课中，你将学习导航到给定房屋位置的“详情”页面。

In this lesson, you enabled routing in your app as well as defined new routes. Now your app can support navigation between views. In the next lesson, you will learn to navigate to the "details" page for a given housing location.

应用程序取得了很大进步，干得好。

You are making great progress with your app, well done.

如果你在学习这节课时遇到了任何问题，可以在查看完整代码。

If you are having any trouble with this lesson, you can review the completed code for it in the .

Next stepslink
